data.actual_result: The confirmation modal appears in the first case but not in the second.
data.expected_result: The confirmation modal appears in both cases.
data.short_description: When you cancel an ongoing friend request directly through the green button, a confirmation modal appears but when you click on the cancel button in the kebab menu, no confirmation modal appears. The request is directly cancelled.
data.steps_to_repro: - Send someone a friend request. - Click on "Friend request sent" in their profile. - Enjoy the modal. - Now, click on the kebab menu in their profile. - Click on cancel.
